name: Botanic Gardens Conservation International
goal: BGCI's mission is to mobilise botanic gardens and engage partners in securing plant diversity for the well-being of people and the planet.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: BGCI convenes the European Botanic Gardens Consortium, which is an 'network of networks'. The Consortium consists representatives of the botanic garden networks of each European country. The Consortium focuses on supporting  European botanic gardens in relation to national and international biodiversity policy implementation, especially the Convention on Biological Diversity, the European Biodiversity Strategy and the Nagoya Protocol on Access and Benefit Sharing.
